amendment.description: Amendment integrated two competitive funding streams and improved collaboration between state and national entities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-539 to integrate two competitive funding streams and seek to improve collaboration between state and national entities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Matsui.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
